name: Combat Tactician
description: A feat that grants bonuses to tactical combat positioning and ally coordination
author: TRPG Line Community

benefits.description: You are skilled at coordinating allies in combat and taking advantage of tactical positioning.
mechanics: As a bonus action, you can grant one ally within 30 feet advantage on their next attack roll
When you take the Help action, you can affect allies within 10 feet instead of 5 feet
You gain proficiency in one of the following skills: Insight, Perception, or Investigation
